about: Proactive Software and Information Systems Engineer with 3+ years of experience in Flutter development (mobile, desktop, and web), and a solid foundation in Android Java. Experienced team leader with strong problem‑solving skills, freelance consultant, and a passionate developer focused on user‑centric solutions.

positions.title: Flutter Team Leader
responsibilities: Led a team from concept to deployment.
Developed internal productivity tools in Flutter.
Integrated Odoo ERP for HR, finance, inventory.
Built feature‑rich mobile apps (payments, chat, maps).
Delivered end‑to‑end app/web solutions for clients.
Developed scalable tools for businesses & students.

projects.name: Electric Devices
projects.description: Control devices via Bluetooth/Wi‑Fi/Internet with encrypted keys.
projects.details: A comprehensive IoT control application that allows users to manage various electronic devices remotely. Features include secure encrypted communication, multi-protocol support (Bluetooth, Wi-Fi, Internet), and real-time device monitoring.

projects.name: Sections
projects.description: Manage employee performance and official documents with e‑signatures and notifications.
projects.details: Enterprise-level HR management system with advanced document handling, electronic signatures, performance tracking, and automated notification system. Built for scalability and security.

projects.name: Qundos
projects.description: Connects clients to maintenance technicians with location & secure chat features.
projects.details: On-demand maintenance service platform connecting customers with verified technicians. Features real-time location tracking, secure messaging, payment integration, and service rating system.

projects.name: School App
projects.description: Manages student data & organizes school competitions.
projects.details: Complete school management system handling student information, academic records, competition organization, and parent-teacher communication.

projects.name: Best Coach
projects.description: Gym app with training levels and sports equipment marketplace.
projects.details: Fitness application combining personalized training programs with an integrated marketplace for sports equipment. Features workout tracking, progress analytics, and social features.

projects.name: Al‑Matin HR App
projects.description: Manages employee leaves, evaluations, and HR tasks.
projects.details: Internal HR management application for Al-Matin Group, handling employee leave requests, performance evaluations, and various HR administrative tasks with workflow automation.

projects.name: Production System
projects.details: Industrial production monitoring system providing real-time tracking of manufacturing processes, quality control, and comprehensive reporting dashboard.

projects.name: Cost Calculations
projects.description: Tracks and analyzes sales & production data in real‑time.
projects.details: Business intelligence application for cost analysis, sales tracking, and production data analytics with advanced reporting and forecasting capabilities.

projects.name: AIODA (College Project)
projects.description: AI object detection app using YOLO for the visually impaired.
projects.details: Accessibility-focused mobile application using YOLO object detection to assist visually impaired users in identifying objects in their environment through voice feedback.

projects.name: DMA (College Project)
projects.description: Digital medical assistant for disease identification.
projects.details: AI-powered medical diagnostic assistant that helps identify potential diseases based on symptoms input. Selected for incubation by Al-Baath University.

projects.name: My Univ
projects.description: Website to archive university lectures and resources.
projects.details: Educational platform for archiving and organizing university lectures, study materials, and academic resources with search and categorization features.

achievements: Selected for DMA project incubation by Al‑Baath University (2019).
